images.description: This website is a AJAX tutorial that my whole class did where we got to personalize with our own images.  This website is from my Senior year.
This is a simple Bootstrap project where my partner, Ryan Chung, and I worked to make a website about the movie, Annabelle.  This website was made in my Junior year.
This is a very simple CSS animation ghost that my class made from a tutorial.  Everyone had their own ghost and got to personalize it how they wanted.  This website was made in my Junior year.

This website is about the comic artist Jack Kirby.  This website was one of the first times I used Javascript.  This website used Javascript to make an accordion-type gallery selection.  This website was made in my Junior year.
This is a Javascript Calculator that everyone in my class made to help familiarize themselves with Javascript.  The calculator is fully functioning and was made in my Senior Year.
This is my Work Based Learning Project where I collaborated with the head of the Phase Tw0 organization, Nina Cao, to make a website for them.  This website was made in my Senior year.
This website is my portfolio from my Junior year of high school.  It used the same ideas but was a single-paged website instead.  As the name suggests, this website was made in my Junior year.

This website is a fully functioning Rock, Paper, Scissors game made only with Javascript.  The user plays against a computer while the website tracks the amount of wins and losses the player has.  This website was made in my Junior year.
This website is a collection of photos taken to depict a wide range of different colors.  This website was one of the last websites made in my Sophomore year.
This website is a tutorial my whole class did to learn Vue.  It is also personalized to have my own top three movies.  THis website was made in my Senior year.
